description: portrait of a man with a light-colored Van Dyke beard and light-colored wavy hair, wearing a white shirt; man holds a hat in his PR hand; head of hound dog, LLC
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Inscription

LRC of mount, in pencil: [Beraldi 28], [BS47] and [07/211 (?)]; URC of mount, in pencil: [5810]; on back of mount, in pencil: various notes and inscriptions
markings: LLC on mount, in pencil: [1er etat]
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until 2000; sold in September for POOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2000-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC below image, in the plate: [Bracquemond inv-fec]; center below image, in brown ink: [Desforges de Vassens]; URC, in the print: [1856]; ULC, in the print: [B. à D. de V]
title: Portrait of Desforges de Vassens
